body:
Jesus actually does approve, jesus advocated taking up swords against degenerates and demons

the right is also not anti-healthcare, quite the opposite, they oppose anti-healthcare legislation like Obamacare or biden's price hikes on essential medicines, or mandates of unapproved medicines on the populace. 

and lastly, being pro war against confederates, nazis, muslims, etc, is how pro life works. by definition, killing leftists makes you pro life

body: I mostly agree but guns are kind of needed for defense. A criminal isn't going to worry about some puny gun law when they're literally about to commit murder. And "anti healthcare" is more because government is terrible at providing it like everything else, and even if they weren't it's very dangerous to let them because it gives them complete power over it.

body:
> jesus advocated taking up swords against degenerates and demons

Yeeeeeeaaaaah I don't think so. This "macho supreme leader Jeezus" figure proclaimed by modern christendom is not even anywhere close to the Jesus of the gospels. All who live by the sword will die by the sword in the end. No wonder most of them rarely quote from Mark, Matthew, Luke, or John.

> and lastly, being pro war against confederates, nazis, muslims, etc, is how pro life works. by definition, killing leftists makes you pro life

You might want to word that a little better, leftists usually can't understand that these people are trying to kill us first and will take it as advocating genocide instead of defense.

You might want to word that a little better, leftists usually can't understand that these people are trying to kill us first and will take it as advocating genocide instead of defense.

body:
>Yeeeeeeaaaaah I don't think so

it's literally in the bible.

>All who live by the sword will die by the sword in the end

everyone dies, whether by a sword or not. Even god gets nailed to a cross ;)

>No wonder most of them rarely quote from Mark, Matthew, Luke, or John.

the irony is that jesus tells his disciples to take up a sword in the gospel of Luke. woops.

> leftists usually can't understand that these people are trying to kill us first

that's never been the case. like ever.

the right is a reactionary force to leftist injustice. this is very obvious in even just a basic reading of history. the crusades, both world wars, the French revolution , the american revolution, vietnam, the civil war, the war in iraq. ALL were responses to leftist cunts resisting evolution and getting violent

the Union did not instigate the civil war, the US did not instigate WW2. leftists did. we kill them in response.

we weren't killing you for no reason, you were incinerating jews ffs.

body:
> everyone dies, whether by a sword or not. Even god gets nailed to a cross ;)

Nice loophole to ignore a saying of Jesus.

> the irony is that jesus tells his disciples to take up a sword in the gospel of Luke. woops.

Yeah when they were literally coming to kill them first, and I know very few people who understand this literally. It's foolish to think this negates the tons of other things Jesus said.
